subject: Search and Seizure
Football
lead_paragraph: F.B.I. and I.R.S. agents raided and locked down the headquarters of Pilot Flying J, the family business run by Jimmy Haslam, as part of a continuing investigation.
snippet: F.B.I. and I.R.S. agents raided and locked down the headquarters of Pilot Flying J, the family business run by Jimmy Haslam, as part of a continuing investigation.
